name: Door
description: A large wooden door bars the path ahead. The card offers an opportunity to change.

person: Someone trying to make amends for past misdeeds and adopt a better way of life.
A person who keeps repeating the same mistakes and misdeeds.
creatureTrap: A creature that changes form, or a trapped door.
A creature that causes its prey or enemies to change, such as a lycanthrope or slaad.
place: A door, an open doorway, or a passage from one place to another.
A locked door or barricaded passage.
treasure: An art object that looks very different from various perspectives, or a magic item that creates portals or allows teleportation (such as an Amulet of the Planes).
A jeweled chest or lockbox, or a magic item that resists change (such as an Immovable Rod).
situation: An opportunity to deal with a situation differently than you have in the past.
